info.brief_description: The Xenosaga Females Will Become massive weight gainers or Immobile Mothers
info.description:
First I claim no ownership of the short-lived animated as well as short-lived game series Xenosaga

Second I will remove this interactive if there has been another made by a fellow writing.com

Pregnancy is now available for all adult females including the androids Kos-Mos and her other half T-elos as long as massive weight gain is involved
if you want either Kos-Mos or her other half T-elos to become pregnant with massive weight gain please select Science II
____________________________________________________________________________________________________

rule one
no nudity or suggestive behavior for the children, unless aged to young adult versions of themselves


for the adults Females of Xenosaga complete nudity with suggestive behavior is accepted however don't take it beyond that

rule two
health beauty strength to move is to increase not decrease

Rule three
there is to be no turning into a shapeless blob of fat no death no other expansion except pregnancy

Important note
Since It Is Revealed in Xenosaga III that Shion and Kos-Mos are somehow linked
if the storyline calls for it they are to have the desire to gain weight together

Optional
please check it out my Xenogears female weight gain adventure and my other weight gain interactive
